response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties receive substantial value from this transaction. We understand its worth to you stands at $800,000, and we aim to bridge that gap while maximizing our return. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless and efficient process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
